author: Michelle James
title: 10 Favorite Jewelry Gifts for Her
text:
These top jewelry gifts for her are perfect for Valentineâ€™s Day, Motherâ€™s Day or just because. With classics like tennis bracelets and more!
Jewelry Gifts for Her Is anyone else obsessed with tennis bracelets ? They are a timeless classic that adds a touch of elegance to any outfit and works perfectly year-round.
My husband gave me my first diamond tennis bracelet for Christmas many years ago. To this day, it is still one of my most cherished pieces of jewelry.
This year I continued that tradition by gifting my 28 yo daughter, Amanda, with her own tennis bracelet.
Though, I chose a more modern design with a gorgeous emerald that takes this bracelet to the next level.
Just look at this beauty:
She couldnâ€™t be more excited about it and has been wearing it everywhere.
Tennis Bracelet in Box Emerald Tennis Bracelet She even matched her holiday outfit to the gorgeous green emerald. Here she is with her grandfather:
Today I wanted to share some of my absolute favorite jewelry gifts for her.
Think of staple pieces that will stand the test of time. One tip I have is to start out with pieces in your price range and upgrade as budget allows.
It is not always about the most expensive piece of jewelry, as you will see in this collection. Quality and value is what it is all about. Take your time finding a piece that you know the gift recipient will love and have fun with it. Enjoy!
Turn on your JavaScript to view content Jewelry Gifts for Her Photo Credit: auratenewyork.com Tennis Bracelet with Emerald A center cut emerald brings that "wow" factor to an already stunning tennis bracelet.
Continue Reading John Hardy Women's 6.5mm Chain Bracelet Chain bracelets make a great gift and come in different widths. They can be stacked to make even more of a statement.
Continue Reading Swarovski Sublima Bangle Bracelet Explore the gorgeous bangle bracelets from Swarovski. This snow PavÃ© style with clear round crystals in rose gold is just lovely!
Continue Reading 1/2 Carat 14K White Gold Diamond Pendant Necklace for Women You can never go wrong with a single diamond pendant necklace. It is something that will never go out of style and will work with jeans or an elegant evening out.
Continue Reading Photo Credit: rstyle.me 22 Inch Cultured Pearl Necklace A string of pearls is a must in your jewelry collection. They include a wide range of prices and styles to fit in any budget.
Continue Reading 14k Yellow Gold-Filled Engraved Flowers Heart Locket A locket style necklace makes a sentimental gift, especially when placing a favorite family photo inside.
Continue Reading Photo Credit: rstyle.me 14K Gold Birthstone Ring For Mom A favorite jewelry gift for mom or grandma is a personalized ring, such as a Mother's ring. Include the birthstone of each child or grandchild for a cherished gift.
Continue Reading 14k White Gold Freshwater Cultured Pearl And Diamond Ring A pearl ring is another best selling jewelry gift for women of all ages. This is a family heirloom piece that can be passed down for generations!
Continue Reading Diamond Stud Earrings A few staple jewelry pieces are all you need to pull together any outfit. Diamond studs are at the top of the must-have list!
Continue Reading Gold Hoop Earrings for Women 14K Gold Earrings Lightweight gold hoop earrings are another staple jewelry piece that can be worn daily or on a special occasion.
Continue Reading What do you think about these jewelry gifts for her? Did you find a piece that you want to add to your wish list? I sure did!
What are some of your favorite jewelry gifts that you have received? Leave a comment below.
